Articles.Content:
Hey, so today I made a survey ship to land on Minmus and see if there could have been life due to the lakes ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) but I seemed to just fall strait under the lake for some reason, did this happen to you? I was only going around 1.5m/s on landing so it was a really soft landing.

Pics:

> ![7272698806_a5405a0f6e_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7236/7272698806_a5405a0f6e_b.jpg)
> ![7272701138_4442a28575_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7233/7272701138_4442a28575_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7272703420_6c977fe9d6_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7227/7272703420_6c977fe9d6_b.jpg)
> 
> ![7272697980_a649170fcb_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7081/7272697980_a649170fcb_b.jpg)

That\'s known to happen with those lakes.

My theory is that either the lander\'s engine melted the ice, or Minmus is actually more of a rubble pile than a rigid solid object like Mun, or a mixture of both.

Minmus\'s textures seem to be a little misaligned, I have one or two weird visual bugs with it

I\'m guessing you could still take off again..?
Strange. This usually only happens when I land on the mountains, not the lakes.
Same, ive never had any problems with the ice.

Hah yeah i had that problem for my first few \'landings\' (meant in the loosest of terms), then i started to float above the ice.

Once i actually landed a (stock 8) ) rover and got to driving around some hills when i came to a section where the terrain met the next \'tile\', but it was a metre out of line, so my rover nosed dived and then \'sploded everywhere ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Definitely some terrain bugs atm. Ah well.

I actually just landed in a terrain glitch. I had to move positions and finally got the right surface on the second try. Here\'s a picture of my landing.

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13082.0;attach=21083;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13082.0;attach=21083;image)

Yea, i noticed this too. Once when I was driving on the ice (with a mod) i actually fell through and was falling into the center?? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Then somehow i ended up going 76,600 mps at 1.4trillion meters away from the sun ???

Deleted

**Edited <time datetime="2023-04-24T21:56:01Z" title="04/24/2023 09:56  PM" data-short="1 yr">April 24, 2023</time> by BSOM180**
